about_the_game:
Join our official Discord to keep up with all game development: https://discord.gg/hmfdXs6hQK



Moussacre is a fast-paced 2D platformer inspired by classic cartoons; each animation being carefully drawn frame by frame. Run through levels at blistering speeds while slashing apart all who stand in your way.



This isn't your normal, family-friendly cartoon mouse. Meet MouseTrap, the paint-thirsty killing machine who yearns to steal victims' color. Prison was not nice to this poor soul. After being forced to star in cartoons for nearly a century, he completely overhauls his identity to break away from who he once was, eventually adopting his prison name, "MouseTrap." This all leads to him executing his grand prison escape, finally being free from the clutches of his owners. Still dead set on filling his life with color, MouseTrap heads for the Hue Fortress, a massive tower said to hold the ultimate source of color; the Prisma Diamond.



  • Explore massive worlds, each with multiple objectives, clever secrets, and colorful characters to interact with.
  • Kill the powerful rulers of the fortress, each with a myriad of tricky tactics and devastating powers.
  • Earn the highest score, best time, or explore at your own pace.
  • Become the ultimate source of color.

    This journey with wacky animations and heart-stopping music will absolutely knock your socks off!

    FLASHING IMAGE WARNING


    This game contains flickering images and patterns that may trigger seizures in those with photosensitive epilepsy. If you are prone to this, please do not play this game (or any other game for that matter). Thank you, and stay safe.

content_descriptors.notes: Cartoon violence; dismemberment and paint (equivalent to blood)

name: Moussacre DEMO
short_description: Imprisoned for nearly a century, MouseTrap finally breaks out and goes on a rampage to steal color... by any means necessary. Experience fast-paced 2D platforming mayhem while slashing apart legions of victims who stand in your way.
